query: 如图,在直角△BAD中,延长斜边BD到点C,使DC=\frac{1}{2}BD,连接AC,若\frac{AD}{AB}=\frac{5}{3},则tan∠CAD的值为()选项：['\\frac{√{3}}{3}', '\\frac{√{3}}{5}', '\\frac{1}{3}', '\\frac{1}{5}']
answer:
解:作DE⊥AD交AC于E．
在Rt△ABD中,∵\frac{AD}{AB}=\frac{5}{3},设AD=5k,AB=3k,∵∠ADE=∠BAD=90°,∴DE∥AB,∴\frac{DE}{AB}=\frac{CD}{CB}=\frac{1}{3},∴DE=k,
在Rt△ADE中,tan∠CAD=\frac{DE}{AD}=\frac{1}{5},
故选:D．
